abstrac: Specializing in illustration, sequential art and comic book production.
bio:
My name is James Keefer and I am an experienced illustrator with over 20 years of experience. 

I specialize in sequential storytelling, graphic novel and comic book style art. I also produce fantasy, historical and horror illustration.

I have worked for many publishers and clients, including National Geographic, Marvel, Malibu, TSR, etc.
I will produce roughs (pencils) and submit them to you for approval. After that I will move forward to inking coloring, etc. I will provide you with progress updates every two days.

bio:
Want to work with the best virtual service provider? Here I have served many clients and online companies with my services for more than 10 years.  Now I am ready to help with my best skills here on Upwork.

My working areas are as a professional freelancer:
-Online Shop Assistant: Amazon and Shopify etc.
-Online Research & Data Entry( Google Sheet & Docs)
-Vast Experience in Product Sourcing & Shipping
-Sales & Marketing
-Travel Plan & Itineraries 
-Quality Control & Inspection

After I completed my Bachelor's in Business Administration & Master's in Tourism Administration then I worked as a Tour Sales Executive for 3 years. Where I had to speak with customers about their travel package related requirement. Now a days I work as a home based tour operator also providing best travel services to clients with the name of Travelyug.

Meanwhile as freelancer I worked with USA based client as their amazon store manager for more than 4  years. I got the chance to learn about the sourcing, listing, inventory management, order processing and shipment confirmation. After learning some skill then from last 5 years I am serving to all over world clients with product sourcing services from India and have more than 1000 satisfied clients. 

I will provide you here best services whenever you need. What make it different to work with me :
- 24*7 availability : Fast response.
- Honest & Dedicated
- Fast & Reliable Services
- Quality & Delivery on time
- Budget Friendly 
- 100% Secure 
- 100% Tracking & Updates
We can communicate through Skype and G talk.

abstrac: 50% upfront 50% at the completion of the order.
bio:
Best Website Development and Web Application Company located in New Delhi and the United States
BISM Softwares provides web design, web development, and mobile application development services ranging from simple e-commerce solutions to mobile apps, complex web applications for every kind of business need for all industries.

We uphold transparency and integrity in client relationships. And regardless of whether you are new to this business or have created many websites/applications before, you will be provided with our care and clearly defined approach throughout the entire process.

We are not just another outsourcing provider. While thinking about the business, we still believe in a better world. We build a relationship with our clients and partners based on truth and honesty. We will not try to sell you our services if we feel like they are useless for you. We will try to help you only where and when you need it. And our happy customers prove that! So why not join them?

For every project we follow a 4-point development methodology:

1) Define: We discuss customer needs and determine the project's scope. We consult with you regarding your goals and provide any needed guidance.

2) Design: Using wireframes and UI prototypes we bring visual clarity to your ideas.

3) Develop: We follow a phased, agile-like development process that involves you the customer as much as possible so you always know the status of your project.

4) Deploy: We offer server deployment, maintenance services, and full integration with your current systems. We ensure your end goal is met, and successfully implemented, on time and within budget.

Industries We Serve:

- Real Estate
- Healthcare
- eCommerce
- Social Networking
- Travel and Hospitality
- Media and Entertainment
- Education and eLearning
- Many more

Technology Expertise:

Open Source

Codeignitor
CMS
Magento
BigCommerce
Cake PHP
OS Commerce
Laravel
Shopify
App Mobile
Mobile

Android (Phone, Tablet, Android TV)
iOS / Apple.

Availability: 24x7

Payment terms: NO UPFRONT PAYMENTS
On Mutual Agreements, only through Guru Safepay only on milestone delivery or hourly payments as mutually agreed.

Communication channels:
Email, Direct US Numbers, Skype, Hangouts, Whatsapp, etc.

bio:
As an owner of GM Publishers, I come on Guru with a lot of experiences in different areas. Recently, I have done several projects with good feedback. My expertise areas are Project Proposal Writing, Web Content Writing , Technical Writing, Academic Writing, Assignment Writing, Report & Research Paper Writing, Business Report Writing,Legal Writing , Contract drafting , Report formatting, Proof Reading, Business Proposal Writing & Editing, Business Analysis, Transcription , Virtual Assistant , Creative Writing , e-mail handling , PDF conversion ,e-mail support ,power point presentation, e-commerce ,copy writing, Social media marketing(Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook fan page designing ,Logo designing , Online researching .

My team is ready to accept any type of challenge. I hope our clients will give me an opportunity to successfully finish their projects.

Hours of Operation for Hourly Job: 20 hours in a week

Hours of Operation for Fixed Price Job: As per client's preference

Payment Procedure: Prefer verified payment method for both hourly & fixed price clients. The client has to add fund in the escrow before beginning a fixed price job.

Work Guarantee: If the client finds any issue in the completed job then the contractor will ready to edit the task to fulfill the demand of the client. In this circumstance, the client has to clear the outstanding payments  before the beginning of editing process.

abstrac: I am Balam Singh. A freelance Web developer, mobile app developer and Graphic designer and Web designer, having over 10+years of experience in the field.
bio:
Before talking about qualifications and professional abilities, I would like to introduce myself. I am Balam Singh and I am from Chandigarh, India. Taking web development and designing as a profession not only fulfills my pocket but also my heart because it has been my passion since my early teenage.

I am very much very much comfortable to assist you in both scratch /ongoing React development tasks as I have relevant skills and past work references in ReactJS (Redux & Flux), React Native, NodeJS, Mongodb, Postgres, PYTHON, JavaScript, CSS3, linux, JSON, REST API integrations etc. I have developed various websites to optimize their search engines and to create easier user interfaces.

There are many websites and apps which I have developed and are running successfully.

I am a  Graphic designer and Web designer as well, having over 10+years of experience in designing field. I am expert in designing Logos design, Websites design, Banners, Flyer, Icon designs, Stationery designs, labels,  poster, book cover, brochures,  etc.

I've been working on Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, Micromedia Flash, Adobe Dreamweaver, HTML, XTHML, CSS in my 10+ years of designing career.

I am sure that if you hire me, I will present you many successful projects with minimal efforts from your side.
I am available from Monday to Sunday for full-time. I am always touching in work during the project. During the assignment, I would be there on Guru 24*7 in case of any query.
